forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
